Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththirane, Nee Isravel Vamsaththaarukku Oru Vidukadhaiyaiyum Uvamaiyaiyum Koori, Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal:

3 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar, Periya Settaigalaiyum Neelamaana Iragugalaiyum Udaiyadhum, Palavarunamaana Iragugalaal Niraindhadhumaagiya Oru Periya Kazhugu Leebanonil Vandhu, Oru Kedhuruvin Nunikkilaiyaip Pidiththu,
4 adhin Ilankilaiyilulla Kozhundhugalaikkoidhu, Adhai Varththaga Dhesaththukkuk Kondupoi, Adhai Varththagarudaiya Nagaraththil Vaiththadhu;
5 dhesaththin Vidhaiyil Ondrai Eduththu, Adhaip Payirnilaththile Pottu, Adhai Eduththu, Migundha Thanneer Oraththile Baththiramaai Nattadhu.

6 adhu Thulirththu, Padarndhu, Thaazhndha Adimaramulla Dhraatchachchediyaayitru; Adhinkodigal Andhak Kazhugukku Neraagavum, Adhin Vergal Adhin Keezhaagavum Irundhana; Ivvidhamaai Adhu Dhraatchachchediyaagi, Kilaigalai Veesi, Koppugalaivittadhu.

7 andriyum Periya Settaigalaiyum Thiralaana Iragugalaiyum Udaiya Veroru Periya Kazhugu Irundhadhu; Idho, Adhu Than Nadavaagiya Paaththigalilirundhu Adharkuth Thanneer Paaichchumpadi Indha Dhraatchachchedi Adharku Neraagath Than Vergalai Vittu, Adharku Neraagath Than Kodigalai Veesinadhu.
8 koppugalai Vidugiradharkum, Kaniyaith Tharugiradharkum, Magimaiyaana Dhraatchachchediyaagiradharkum, Idhu Migundha Thanneergalin Oramaagiya Nalla Nilaththil Nadappattirundhadhu.

9 idhu Sezhikkumaa? Idhu Pattuppogaththakkadhaai Oruvan Idhin Vergalaip Pidungaamalum, Idhin Kaniyai Vettaamalum Iruppaano? Thulirththa Ellaa Laigalodum Idhu Pattuppogum; Idhai Verode Pidungumpadi Oruvan Balaththa Buyaththodum Thiranda Janaththodum Varaththevaiyillai.

10 idho, Nadappatta Idhu Sezhippaayirukkumo? Kondalkaatru Idhinperil Padumpodhu Idhu Vaadi Ularndhupogaadho? Idhu Nadappatta Paaththigalile Vaadippomendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
11 pinbu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

12 ippodhum Ivaigalin Thaarpariyam Theriyumaa Endru Nee Kalagaveettaaraikkettu Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Baabilon Raajaa Erusalemukku Vandhu, Adhin Raajaavaiyum Adhin Prabukkalaiyum Pidiththu, Avargalaith Thannidamaaga Baabilonukkuk Kondupogumpodhu,
13 avan Raajavamsaththile Oruvanaith Thaththeduththu, Avanode Udanpadikkaipanni,

14 raajyam Thannai Uyarththaamal Thaazhndhirukkumpadikkum, Than Udanpadikkaiyai Avan Kaikkollugiradhinaal Adhu Nilainirkumpadikkum, Avanai Aanaippramaanaththukku Utpaduththi, Dhesaththil Balasaaligalaip Pidiththadhukkonduponaane.

15 ivan Avanukku Virodhamaaik Kalagancheydhu, Thanakkuk Kudhiraigalaiyum Anegam Aatkalaiyum Anuppavendumendru Than Sthaanaapadhigalai Egipthukku Anuppinaan; Ippadippattavanukku Vaaikkumo? Ippadi Seygiravan Thappiththukkolvaano? Udanpadikkaiyai Muriththavan Thappiththukkolvaano?

16 thannai Raajaavaaga Erpaduththiya Raajaavinudaiya Aanaiyai Asattaipanni, Avanudaiya Udanpadikkaiyai Muriththuppottavan, Andha Raajaavinudaiya Sthaanamaagiya Baabilon Naduvile Avan Andaiyil Irundhu Maranamadaivaanendru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
17 avan Anegam Janangalai Naasampannumpadi Anaipottu, Koththalangalaik Kattumpodhu, Paarvon Periyasenaiyodum, Thiralaana Koottaththodum Vandhu Ivanukkaaga Yuththaththil Udhavamaattaan.
18 idho, Ivan Kaiyadiththuk Koduththirundhum Udanpadikkai Muriththuppottu, Aanaiyai Asattaipanninaan; Ippadiyellaam Seydhavan Thappuvadhillai.

19 adhinimiththam Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Avan En Aanaiyai Asattaipanninadhaiyum, En Udanpadikkaiyai Muriththuppottadhaiyum, Naan Avanudaiya Thalaiyinmel Varappannuven Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren.
20 avan Ennudaiya Kanniyil Adappadumpadikku Naan En Valaiyai Avanmel Veesi, Avanai Baabilonukkuk Kondupoi, Avan Enakku Virodhamaaip Pannina Dhrogaththinimiththam Ange Avanai Nyaayam Visaarippen.

21 avanodekooda Odippogira Yaavarum Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvangalum Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal; Meedhiyaanavargalo Sagala Thisaigalilum Sidharadikkappaduvaargal; Appozhudhu Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen Endru Arindhukolveergal.

22 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal Naan Uyarndha Kedhuruvin Nunikkilaigalil Ondrai Eduththu Naduven; Adhin Ilankilaiyilulla Kozhundhugalil Ilasaayirukkira Ondraik Koidhu, Adhai Uyaramum Unnadhamumaana Oru Parvadhaththinmel Naattuven.

23 isravelin Uyaramaana Parvadhaththile Adhai Naattuven; Adhu Koppugalai Vittu, Kanithandhu, Magimaiyaana Kedhuruvaagum; Adhin Keezhe Sagalavidha Patchijaadhigalum Thangi, Adhin Kilaigalin Nizhalile Thaabarikkum.

24 appadiye Karththaraagiya Naan Uyarndha Virutchaththaith Thaazhththi, Thaazhndhavirutchaththai Uyarththinen Endrum, Naan Pachchaiyaana Virutchaththaip Pattuppogappanni, Pattuppona Virutchaththaith Thazhaikkappanninen Endrum Veliyin Virutchangalukku Ellaam Theriyavarum; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen; Idhai Niraivetrinen Endru Uraiththaarendru Sol Endraar.
